message:
Should I go on with the security career or I am too late that I won't reach anything? I am a level 2 computer science student.
I just have the fear that I am wasting my time trying to learn about something and when the time comes and I graduate I find no job as I don't have enough experience or I am not good enough, so any advice?

data.message:
Firstly, You will reach knowledge which is the most important thing. Knowledge, especially if it's in computer security, is never a waste of time. Especially that you are still a student, so it's just the right time to learn what you like, not what your employer wants.
Secondly, Nobody starts as good enough, everybody starts as a beginner.
Thirdly, understanding security issues better will certainly make you a better developer, even if you don't specialize in security at work.
Finally, you can always find a job related to security whether locally or abroad one day if you have it in your mind and you are hardworking enough.
learn about VMware and virtualization..  Google topics like Network virtualization,  SDN..  this is the true future
"Student" and "Too Late" Don't Mix... :) Security jobs are top jobs in IT but be prepared to may not find good jobs in Egypt eventually (same stands true for many other specialties).

الفيديو دا هيفيدك وهيديك الإجابة , دول 3 فى مجال الـ Security , والثلاثة بره مصر :- 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lvkjvPllwZw
